sense.gloss: speaking by proxy, speaking for (someone else), acting as spokesman (for), representing (the views, feelings, etc. of)
payment by proxy, compensation by proxy, paying on behalf (of)
acting for (someone else), carrying out (on someone's behalf)

sdata.j: ↑誰↑↓だれ↓が↑代弁↑↓|だいべん|↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓になるか。
↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑家↑↓いえ↓のない↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓の↑代弁↑↓|だいべん|↓をした。
↑学生↑↓がくせい↓↑時代↑↓じ|だい↓↑勉強↑↓べん|きょう↓せずにいい↑成績↑↓せいせき↓を↑取↑↓と↓っていたのを↑自慢↑↓じまん↓するところが、↑彼↑↓かれ↓について↑一番↑↓いちばん↓↑気↑↓き↓に↑入↑↓い↓らないところ。
sdata.e: The thing I hate most about him is that he boasts of having had good grades in school despite not studying.
